description:
The course is divided into four lectures of valuable and applicable insights and an inspiring case study feature presentation; Learn how to avoid the crippling mistakes and dangerous pitfalls inventors and entrepreneurs face on the way to the marketplace.

- The Pitfalls of Information Seeking

- Crippling Mistakes in Hiring a Coach or a Mentor

- The Merry Go-Round of Paying for Entrepreneurial or Inventor Services

- The Truth about the Money Ingredient

- Case Study: Mini Documentary of Green2Gold Inventors & Entrepreneurs

If you are serious about developing your ideas, do yourself a favor and study this vital series before you do anything else. It will save you a lot of time and a lot of money.

At the end of the series you will have the option of getting a personal GREAT IDEA Invention Guidance & Analysis by Green2Gold Expert Prof. Alan Tratner. Green2Gold is a non-profit incubator and modern resource and success system helping inventors and entrepreneurs for over 45 years.

The GREAT IDEA Invention Guidance & Analysis is an in-depth confidential evaluation and critique by an expert team of your idea, concept, product or invention, enterprise or non profit to determine viability, potential success, intellectual property opportunities, pathways of commercialization, options and next action steps forward. It results in a private counseling session with findings and recommendations.
title: Vital Study for Inventors & Entrepreneurs
